Plato Library Documentation

PLATOVERSION

Welcome to Plato, a cognitive engine library for cognitive engineering

The purpose of Plato is to provide a modelling library for developing machines with minds based on the conception of mind as a causal system.

The Plato library is written in standard C++ and consists of a number of object oriented classes for modelling cognitive processes.

For details on the key modelling classes, see the Plato namespace.

For examples on how to run models, see the Plato.Examples namespace.
